bibl.bibl: Masłowski, Ludwik, trans. 1875. Wstp do nowoczesnéj chemji. By August Wilhelm von Hofmann. (Polish translation of Hofmann 1865.) Cracow: Nakadem Adolfa Dygasińskiego.
bibl.idno: ref in google; also in list of titles published by the Biblioteka Umiejtności Przyrodniczych Can’t find anything that shows this is definitely a translation of Hofmann 1865, but it def. a Hofmann translation. ELS
